frames.name: ricket
frames.desc: A drawing I made for my friend torcado.

frames.name: band
frames.desc: A collection of my characters in a school band.

frames.name: wonder
frames.desc: A perspective piece I did of one of my characters when I was experimenting with coloring lines.

frames.name: nitro
frames.desc: A piece I did for the ArtFight 2022 event. The character, Nitro, belongs to the artist WIKIPIXEL.

frames.name: purple gal
frames.desc: A character design I made on a whim.

frames.name: rubic.dev
frames.desc: The site you're looking at now. Made using Jekyll, but otherwise programmed from scratch.

frames.name: Beaker
frames.desc: A work-in-progress art program made using Electron and React.

frames.name: PolyominoSolver
frames.desc: A tool designed to solve polyomino fitting problems with an interface according to Google's material design. The UI wasn't finished, but the solver works in your browser's console.

frames.name: Hex Stickers
frames.desc: A set of hexagonal stickers I made of various brands for my own personal use.

frames.name: Starlight
frames.desc: A trading card design intended to be used in an online card trading game called Starlight.

frames.name: Beaker
frames.desc: Various phases of design work for the UI of Beaker.

frames.name: Timekeep
frames.desc: A Unity game completed in one week for Brackeys Jam 2020.2. I worked with three others, handling programming and project management. We placed #29 out of 1,850 entries.

frames.name: Ghost King's Cross
frames.desc: A Unity game completed for Brackeys Jam 2021.2. I worked with four artists and a musician, again being responsible for programming and directing the project. We placed #46 out of 1,750 entries.

frames.name: Spots and Ears
frames.desc:
A narrative-focused platformer game demo that was created in Unity. I was the lone programmer working with a team of six artists.

The project was revealed at San Jose State University's SHMCon in February of 2020.

frames.name: pawb.in
frames.desc: An online, in-browser creature collection game. Currently a work in progress.

frames.name: Dizzyship
frames.desc: A Unity game I completed in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. I worked solo and placed in the top 10% of 5,400 entries.
